alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Knox; Peoria (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 7:26AM CDT until August 11 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN FULTON...SOUTHEASTERN KNOX AND SOUTHWESTERN PEORIA COUNTIES... At 726 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Farmington, or 8 miles north of Canton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. At 724 AM, 60 mph wind gusts were reported at Farmington. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Trivoli around 730 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hanna City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Lincoln.
